metadata.description: Curated OMOP and FHIR concept mappings for oncology clinical trial eligibility criteria
metadata.purpose: Bypass pattern-based database lookup for well-known clinical concepts to prevent semantic mismatches
sources: ASCO-Friends of Cancer Research Working Groups
FDA Cancer Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Guidance

hiv.note: Per FDA guidance, HIV+ patients with CD4 >= 350 cells/uL may be eligible

omop_concept.concept_name: Chronic viral hepatitis B without delta-agent

fhir_codes.display: Chronic viral hepatitis B without delta-agent
Chronic viral hepatitis B without delta-agent

hepatitis_b.note: Per FDA guidance, HBV patients on suppressive therapy may be eligible

hepatitis_c.note: Per FDA guidance, HCV patients with undetectable viral load may be eligible

fhir_codes.display: Atherosclerotic heart disease of native coronary artery without angina pectoris

second_malignancy.note: Common exclusion criterion - often allows curatively treated cancers >3-5 years ago

prior_chemotherapy.sql_template: SELECT DISTINCT person_id FROM procedure_occurrence WHERE procedure_concept_id = 4273629

prior_radiation.sql_template: SELECT DISTINCT person_id FROM procedure_occurrence WHERE procedure_concept_id = 600054592

prior_car_t.note: CAR-T is a type of cellular immunotherapy - use drug_exposure for specific CAR-T products

prior_parp_inhibitor.note: PARP inhibitors are targeted therapies - use drug_exposure for specific agents

prior_egfr_inhibitor.note: EGFR inhibitors are targeted therapies - use drug_exposure for specific agents

prior_alk_inhibitor.note: ALK inhibitors are targeted therapies - use drug_exposure for specific agents

prior_anti_vegf.note: Anti-VEGF agents are targeted therapies - use drug_exposure for specific agents

prior_cdk46_inhibitor.note: CDK4/6 inhibitors are targeted therapies - use drug_exposure for specific agents

prior_mtor_inhibitor.note: mTOR inhibitors are targeted therapies - use drug_exposure for specific agents

prior_mek_inhibitor.note: MEK inhibitors are targeted therapies - use drug_exposure for specific agents

prior_platinum.note: Platinum agents are cytotoxic chemotherapy - use drug_exposure for specific agents

prior_anthracycline.note: Anthracyclines are cytotoxic chemotherapy - use drug_exposure for specific agents

prior_taxane.note: Taxanes are cytotoxic chemotherapy - use drug_exposure for specific agents

prior_pd1_inhibitor.note: PD-1 inhibitors are checkpoint inhibitor immunotherapy - use drug_exposure for specific agents

prior_ctla4_inhibitor.note: CTLA-4 inhibitors are checkpoint inhibitor immunotherapy - use drug_exposure for specific agents

anticoagulants.note: Often excluded due to bleeding risk

corticosteroids.note: May be limited to <= 10 mg prednisone equivalent

cyp3a4_inhibitors.note: Often excluded due to drug-drug interactions

cyp3a4_inducers.note: Often excluded due to drug-drug interactions

live_vaccines.note: Often excluded within 30 days prior to study treatment

investigational_drug.note: Typically requires washout of 4-5 half-lives or 28 days

smoking_status.sql_template: SELECT DISTINCT person_id FROM observation WHERE observation_concept_id = 43054909
smoking_status.note: Do NOT use 'Family history of smoking' - patient's own smoking status

pregnancy.sql_template: SELECT DISTINCT person_id FROM observation WHERE observation_concept_id = 42528957

age.sql_template: SELECT DISTINCT person_id FROM person WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM AGE(CURRENT_DATE, birth_datetime)) >= 18

fhir_codes.display: Acute embolism and thrombosis of unspecified deep veins of lower extremity
Other pulmonary embolism without acute cor pulmonale

ct_scan.note: CT scan is a procedure - NEVER a drug formulation

paclitaxel_hypersensitivity.sql_template: SELECT DISTINCT person_id FROM observation WHERE observation_concept_id = 43020460
paclitaxel_hypersensitivity.note: Hypersensitivity reactions to paclitaxel often related to Cremophor EL vehicle

platinum_hypersensitivity.sql_template: SELECT DISTINCT person_id FROM observation WHERE observation_concept_id = 4022306
platinum_hypersensitivity.note: Platinum compound allergies - use general drug allergy with specific agent in notes

docetaxel_hypersensitivity.sql_template: SELECT DISTINCT person_id FROM observation WHERE observation_concept_id = 43020458

herbal_remedies.non_queryable_reason: Traditional/herbal medicines are not systematically coded in standard medical vocabularies. Requires patient interview or chart review.
herbal_remedies.note: Mark as non-queryable - herbal medicines not in OMOP CDM

investigator_discretion.non_queryable_reason: Subjective clinical assessment made at screening - inherently non-queryable
investigator_discretion.note: Inherently subjective criteria that cannot be pre-screened

informed_consent.non_queryable_reason: Consent is obtained during screening visit - not a pre-screening criterion
informed_consent.note: Consent criteria are screening-time requirements, not database queries
